ygData.subject: RE: All i know bout Najena Dungeon...
ygData.msgSnippet: I join the Sun camp, from morning to night. Can tell me the time u be logging? ;)
ygData.messageBody:
I join the Sun camp, from morning to night. Can tell me the time u be logging? ;)

On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 5:56 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> if u all can do it this coming Sun to Tues ( 3 off days straight) I can
> lor. heheh. Else I go there myself to camp for it. heheh
>
> "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
> >
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > ok... drez spwawn every 20 mins... if she doesnt spawn... a necro will be in
> > her place... so no gurantee that she will spawn... also jboots is no
> > gurantee... rumors that said that she give jboots every 8 hours... and each
> > time 3 in a row... but so far i have no seen it to be any true... so its a
> > bloody long wait... the worst camping session that u ever had... worse than
> > fbr... since someone can gather like 10fbr.. and we still havent get 1
> > boots... its that bad...
> >
> > usually folks queue up for the boots... so when i got there... say theres 3
> > person... then they will auto invite me into the group... whenever we kill
> > drez... the 1st person in line will always loot her... until he/she get the
> > boots.. then the next person in line comes up... (bcos its LORE AND NO
> > DROP)... this goes on n on... ocasionally u get bastards that come n try to
> > loot... usually they are kicked out of the group immediately... off course u
> > can steal the kill if u want... but usually everyone follow this... so dont
> > be surprised that u go there and theres like 3-4 person in najena dungeon...
> > BUT all 3-4 in that bloody room waiting for her to spwan the boots... so
> > thast y i said its a long wait... u just have to get in line somewhere
> > sometime... dont expect that place to be empty... most unlikely... unless u
> > lucky...
> >
> > as fer najena room... can be empty for a long time... not everyone camp
> > her... but sometimes there are.... as for fbr... its not really a great robe
> > to wear... when u reach level 34-35... u might wanna get the oracle robe
> > instead... with a team of level 30+... shoud have no prob killing the
> > oracle.. its just getting the faction hit... hehe... so oracle robe usually
> > sells for 1k pp... and not many sell em...
> >
> > its a good idea to camp both sites... esp when one side need help the other
> > team is just round the corner... but i wouldnt do it this weekend... have
> > enough of najena dungeon.... i wanna be damn level 30.... so perhaps next
> > weekend... if possible.. im sure to hit level 25 this weekend... more i
> > dunno... but i hope 27... hehe... since im close to 24 now... then i will be
> > hunting treants....
> >
> > as for the bloodclaw... its only necro, shadow knight n rogue weapon only...
> > so we can camp and sell it... usually it goes for 200-250pp.... also... the
> > loot there is pretty good... theres quite alot of fine steel weapon loot
> > from necromancers... sometimes stones... n coins...
> >
> > Nicademous
> > p/s : if everyone is above level 25 and is commited to stay for a long
> > time... i dont mind going there again... dont wanna go there... camp for 5-6
> > hours then everyone starts leaving... then i dont see the point... everyone
> > must at least commit like 10-12 hours to be safe to get something for
> > everyone... n bloody want the jboots!!!!
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 12:03 PM
> > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] All i know bout Najena Dungeon...
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > WAH this dungeon got so many goodies! OK OK, I will organise a lvl 25-35
> > > hunting trip to Najena next weekend. Those 20-25 still got more than a
> > > week to buck up. Since this place got so many stuffs our kakis community
> > > can use, I strongly encourage those who can make it join the event. We
> > may
> > > be more than 1 grp but it's ok as long as we have the lvl to do thing
> > > smoothly. And for that hunt, we may need to use guidesay. So those below
> > > lvl 25, dun just drop ya saliver, start ya god damn training NOW!!! ;)
> > >
> > > p/s: Since Drezlna spawn every 20 min, does that mean Jboot also spawn
> > > quite fast? Or it's like 10 Drezlna only spawn 1 Jboot kinda thing? I
> > > heard abt queueing for Najena, how does tat works? Better explain
> > > everything to all kakis b4 we act foolishly and offended other grps, hehe.
> > >
> > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 10:48 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > > >
> > > > ok... as far as i know... najena herself (where u get tome or fbr) is
> > > level
> > > > 28 mage.. she will havea elemental pet... sometimes when she doesnt
> > > spawn..
> > > > a elemental will spawn on her spot instead... her 2 guardians are 2
> > > > magicians bout level 20+ but i believe not more than level 25... they
> > too
> > > > will have elemental pets...
> > > >
> > > > as for drezlna (where u get bloodclaw or jboots) is level 25
> > > necromancer...
> > > > she will have a pet skele... sometimes when she doesnt spawn... a
> > > > necromancer will spawn on her spot instead ... she spawns every 20
> > > mins....
> > > > either her or one necro...
> > > > her 2 guardians are 2 necromancers bout level 20+ but i believe should
> > > not
> > > > be more than 22 since they all con blue to me when i was level 22
> > > there...
> > > > they too will have pet skeletons...
> > > >
> > > > if u managed to break the spawn at the beginning... then will be easy...
> > > > the last time...my group consist of 2 shadow knight level 20-25, plus me
> > > and
> > > > one magician level 25... we managed to hold that place for drezlna ...
> > > not
> > > > problem.... occasionally... there will be ogre guards, tentacles and
> > > moosh
> > > > that comes into the room and create trouble... they always choose to
> > come
> > > at
> > > > the 'right' time... also.. somehow theres a bug in that room that
> > > sometimes
> > > > moosh can punch thru the wall... so be careful.... as for najena room...
> > > > there are ocasionally froglock ghouls that interrupts the room... others
> > > im
> > > > not sure... perhaps elementals... tanks are certainly good help... but 2
> > > -3
> > > > high level spell casters can do the job liaoz... as fer monks... i think
> > > if
> > > > u camp Rathyl (or something like that)... theres a jewel piece YY might
> > > be
> > > > interested... hehe.. not sure if hes still interested... but i heard
> > > monks
> > > > needs em...Black Sapphire or something like that...
> > > >
> > > > u need a golden key to get into najena's room and a purple one into
> > > drez's
> > > > room.... we can also camp the bone cracker for dark circlet... but thats
> > > > necro only item... hehe... or the ogre captian for some weapon... that
> > > tanks
> > > > might be interested.... thats all i know bout that stupid dungeon...
> > > >
> > > > Nicademous
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 11:18 AM
> > > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Heheh, then wat say u if we make a trip for FBR coming up?
> > > > >
> > > > > But 1st thing 1st, I still wanna know the normal mob lvl in Najena.
> > If
> > > > all
> > > > > other mobs are ard lvl 20, it will make a pure casters grp to even
> > > reach
> > > > > the destination coz we will be busy nuking and meding. Once our mana
> > > all
> > > > > out, all die cock stand.
> > > > >
> > > > > Thus I would suggest only those high lvl 20s to come along, esp when
> > > there
> > > > > is no tank. Nica and Zan better buck up. Kell and Kal too if
> > possible
> > > ;)
> > > > > Afterall, FBR is more sought after by casters. Ask the tankers along
> > > > they
> > > > > may feel boring, hehe. But Jboot definitely need tanks, and "most
> > > > > probably" they will be interested also, hehe.
> > > > >
> > > > > FF got his FBR at 175pp, let see if we can all get it FOC :) With 2
> > > wiz,
> > > > 3
> > > > > magi at least, it shldnt be too problematic to get FBR.
> > > > >
> > > > > OOi, hurry up lvl leh! ;)
> > > > >
> > > > > Ziltus
> > > > >
> > > > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 9:51 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > camping for jboots is more like luck... if u lucky u get it maybe
> > > even
> > > > > the
> > > > > > first kill... if u suay like me... 19 hours straight camp n only one
> > > > pair
> > > > > > and that fucking pair goes to someone in front of the queue...
> > > camping
> > > > > fbr
> > > > > > is much easier... but 3 person its impossible to camp for fbr n
> > > boots...
> > > > > > bcos both are at different location... although same dungeon... but
> >
> > > need
> > > > > the
> > > > > > 3 to be at that spot... unless u guys can 24 hours dont sleep...
> > then
> > > > can
> > > > > > camp both spots... if u say 2 level 20 + 1 level 30 wiz/ mage... at
> > > one
> > > > > > place... i think good enough... so if we have like 4 level 20 and 2
> > > > > level
> > > > > > 30... we can bao the whole dungeon liaoz... but then... theres
> > always
> > > > > > someone there to camp jboots... but fbr not all the time...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > speaking from my 19 hours in dungeon najena...
> > > > > > Nicademous
> > > > > >
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 10:26 AM
> > > > > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hmm, I have a friend who get Jboot in just few hrs camping - just
> > > camp
> > > > > at
> > > > > > > the least peak hr - S'pore time 4pm to 8 pm. This is the timing
> > > when
> > > > > Inno
> > > > > > > server got least players.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Now we have 3 lvl 30 kakis in SG guild - Garren, Leshrec and FF.
> > I
> > > > > shld
> > > > > > be
> > > > > > > able to lvl b4 weekend. 4 of us - Lvl 35 Pala, 2 lvl 30 Wiz and 1
> > > Lvl
> > > > > 30
> > > > > > > Magi with pet, shld be abt to handle quite well. I propose the
> > 1st
> > > > > troop
> > > > > > > Najena hunt after the SOO hunt, maybe the weekend after this, for
> > > FBR
> > > > > and
> > > > > > > Jboot. It may be a Fri 7pm to 3am hunt (details to be spelled out
> > > > > later).
> > > > > > > All those who are lvl 20 plus still got 1 week plus to lvl to 30
> > > and
> > > > > join
> > > > > > > us for the hunt ;) (Zan & NIca especially, hehe)
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hey u guys at lvl 20+ shld form some troop to go for dirk, SBS or
> > > WCS
> > > > > ;)
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Ziltus Planeswalker (VS)
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 8:25 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > > > > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > > > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy"
> > > <sccheng@...>
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > as for jboots... its 24 hours on camp... so u just have to be
> > > > > somewhere
> > > > > > > in
> > > > > > > > the queue... i suggest one weekend and dont plan on sleeping for
> > > 24
> > > > > > hours
> > > > > > > or
> > > > > > > > so... then u can be sure of getting it... and at the same
> > time...
> > > > > make
> > > > > > > sure
> > > > > > > > theres a team with u (not someone that get his boots then hes
> > > > > gone)...
> > > > > > > > also... although u just have to fight Drezlna and her 2
> > > necromancers
> > > > > +
> > > > > > > > petssss, there are lots of surprises that will come into the
> > room
> > > > > outta
> > > > > > > > sudden... its not like if those are green to u they wont come...
> > > > some
> > > > > > > still
> > > > > > > > will... AND they always choose to come at the right time (wrong
> > > time
> > > > > for
> > > > > > > > you) thats my advice... so far i see that 2 wizards level34 and
> > 1
> > > > > cleric
> > > > > > > > level 36 manage to hold out that place no prob... BUT the 2 wiz
> > > > alone
> > > > > > > might
> > > > > > > > not be enough... since drez can multiple harm touch... and each
> > > goes
> > > > > > like
> > > > > > > > 300hp...
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > cheers,
> > > > > > > > Nicademous
> > > > > > > >
